channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Outside 2 Cavendish Road (spread along pavement), 31st July
item.description:
Lots of children’s toys etc dumped alongside a large footstool.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cavendish Road, London

item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: Pothole around metalwork in right hand lane of road, next to the barrier, 31st July
item.description:
Pothole around metalwork in right hand lane of road, next to the barrier between the two directions of the road. Had got increasingly large. Hard to avoid if have a wide vehicle in that lane.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North Circular Road, Temple Fortune, London
Report on FixMyStreet
